name: Astral Projection
dialogs: Brother Transcendence has been in deep meditation for days.
His spirit is lost somewhere in the astral plane.
Only someone who can project their own spirit can reach him.
Your astral form is stabilizing - you're learning quickly.
The ethereal maze shifts and changes, but you're finding your way.
You've found him! Brother Transcendence's spirit is safe.
He's returning to his body - the meditation trance is broken!
